### Prerequisites

### Steps to reproduce

When running a command then piping out-file, if that command has color formatting in powershell 7 it seems to export the color formatting as well. 

In following examples, I'm just censoring my user profile name.

Following command I'm using is  `ls | out-file test.txt`

### Expected behavior

```console
Directory: C:\Users\(user)


Mode                 LastWriteTime         Length Name                            
----                 -------------         ------ ----                            
d-----        2022-04-18   9:32 AM                .openshot_qt                    
d-r---        2021-08-09   3:06 PM                3D Objects                      
d-----        2021-12-17  12:42 PM                ansel                           
d-r---        2021-08-09   3:06 PM                Contacts                        
d-r---        2022-04-26   9:41 AM                Desktop                         
d-r---        2022-04-22  12:41 PM                Documents                       
d-r---        2022-04-27  12:23 PM                Downloads                       
d-r---        2021-08-09   3:06 PM                Favorites                       
d-r---        2021-08-09   3:06 PM                Links                           
d-r---        2021-08-09   3:06 PM                Music                           
d-r---        2021-08-09   3:24 PM                OneDrive                        
d-r---        2022-04-19   3:46 PM                Pictures                        
d-r---        2021-08-09   3:06 PM                Saved Games                     
d-r---        2021-08-09   3:08 PM                Searches                        
d-r---        2022-04-18  12:02 PM                Videos                          
d-----        2022-03-07  10:10 AM                Web                             
-a----        2022-03-02  11:44 AM              0 Sti_Trace.log                   
-a----        2022-04-27   4:00 PM           1251 test.txt                        
-a----        2022-04-27   4:05 PM              0 test2.txt
```


### Actual behavior

```console
Directory: C:\Users\(user)

[32;1mMode                 LastWriteTime         Length Name[0m

```
